## DefaultValidationErrorRenderer.\_toggleErrors() method

Toggles css classes for errors that are currently set

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
protected _toggleErrors(add?: boolean): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  add | boolean | Indication whether add or remove errors |
